section.title: Configure the Neutron Environment with NSX-v
section.para: In summary, integrating NSX with vSphere has four major steps:

step.para: Perform the steps to import the NSX-v third-party driver in openstack/ardana-extensions/vmware into &o_netw; and neutronclient.
Modify the input model to define the server roles, servers, network roles and networks.
Set up the parameters needed for &o_netw; and &o_comp; to communicate with the ESX and NSX Manager.
Do the steps to deploy the cloud.
